00046 /* @brief Sets hint that an online action (dns/connect/etc using WAN) succeeded */
00047 void mark_online();
00048 /* @brief Sets hint that an online action (dns/connect/etc using WAN) failed */
00049 void mark_offline();

00051 int is_online();

00055 /* @brief Sets hint that an auth server online action failed */

00057 /* @brief Returns a guess (true or false) on whether we're an auth server is online or not based on previous calls to mark_auth_online and mark_auth_offline */

00065 #define LOCK_GHBN() do { \
00066         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Locking wd_gethostbyname()"); \
00067         pthread_mutex_lock(&ghbn_mutex); \
00068         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "wd_gethostbyname() locked"); \
00069 } while (0)
00070 
00071 #define UNLOCK_GHBN() do { \
00072         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Unlocking wd_gethostbyname()"); \
00073         pthread_mutex_unlock(&ghbn_mutex); \
00074         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "wd_gethostbyname() unlocked"); \
00075 } while (0)
